DataElement.preferredName: Person Recovered or Resolved Prior Treatment Regimen Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indication as to whether or not the patient has recovered from prior treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Recovered or Resolved Prior Treatment Regimen Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person's recovery from prior therapy as an elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Recovered or Resolved Prior Treatment Regimen Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event has improved or recuperated.:Earlier in time or order.:A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: One of the possible results of an adverse event outcome that indicates that the event has improved or recuperated.
A treatment plan that specifies the dosage, the schedule, and the duration of treatment.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient fully recover
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient fully recovered from the acute toxic effects of all prior chemotherapy, immunotherapy, or radiotherapy, prior to entering this study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient fully recovered from the acute toxic effects of cytotoxic chemotherapy or other anti-cancer agents known to be myelosuppressive?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 100
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient recovered from the acute toxicities of any prior therapy?

DataElement.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form
